nodes.text: Jallissi was a Hutt kajidic, or clan. A notable member of the clan was Tooga Jalliissi Gral.

While the Jallissi kajidic itself has never been mentioned, its existence is implied by the name of Tooga Jallissi Gral. According to Galaxy Guide 11: Criminal Organizations, the cuirvas (or middle name) of a Hutt identified their clan.
